name: Monstify
description:
Monstify is a monster building game inspired by overcooked. Its a couch co-op game that is frustratingly fun and designed for all ages. Create Monster's for super villains and rise in fame!

Check out our Monstify Playthrough here! Click Here

This project was made for our collaborative module at university. We had 8 weeks to create a vertical slice version of our game. Our aim, was simply to create something that was fun!
